list feature
.
## 参考书目
1. Open the Music app.
2. Tap on the "Playlists" tab at the bottom of the screen.
.
<h2>参考书目</h2>
<ol>
<li>1. Open the Music app.</li>
<li>2. Tap on the &quot;Playlists&quot; tab at the bottom of the screen.</li>
</ol>
.
真实案例
.
## 参考书目

1. Simon Moffatt《Consumer Identity & Access Management Design Fundamentals》
2. 王新栋《OAuth 2.0
   实战课》https://time.geekbang.org/column/intro/100053901
3. 周志明《周志明的软件架构课》 https://time.geekbang.org/column/article/329954
4. https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10707-020-00407-w
.
<h2>参考书目</h2>
<ol>
<li>1. Simon Moffatt《Consumer Identity &amp; Access Management Design Fundamentals》</li>
<li>2. 王新栋《OAuth 2.0
实战课》https://time.geekbang.org/column/intro/100053901</li>
<li>3. 周志明《周志明的软件架构课》 https://time.geekbang.org/column/article/329954</li>
<li>4. https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10707-020-00407-w</li>
</ol>
.
